Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th near Lawndale/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near Lawndale/31st.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, 31st and Lawndale.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park and 25th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to mechanical problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to mechanical problems.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Clark/Lake and Racine to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
